TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FontConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 將 物件從一個資料型別轉換為另一個資料型別。

span.span: Converts objects from one data type to another.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 型別轉換子用來轉換資料類型之間的值。A type converter is used to convert values between data types. 型別轉換子也支援在設計階段設定的屬性，藉由提供轉換成值的文字或一份使用者可以從選取的值。A type converter also supports property configuration at design time by providing text-to-value conversion or a list of values that users can select from. 存取權透過類別藉由呼叫類別方法。Access the class through the class by calling the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用要轉換與字串。The following code example demonstrates how to use the to convert a to and from a string. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 此程式碼貼入表單並呼叫`ShowFontStringConversion`方法時處理表單事件，傳遞做為 e 。Paste this code into a form and call the `ShowFontStringConversion` method when handling the form's event, passing e as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Converters#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Converters#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Converters#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該存取物件傳遞方法。You should access a object through the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常見的類型轉換為字串型別來回。The most common type conversion is to and from a string type. 預設實作會呼叫物件方法的物件是否有效，而且如果目的型別是字串。The default implementation calls the method of the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is string.

span.span: The conversion was not successful.

summary.span: 藉由使用指定的物件屬性值組，來建立這個型別的物件。

returns.span: 新建立的物件，或 (如果無法建立物件)。

span.span: The newly created object, or if the object could not be created.
The default implementation returns .

returns.span: 對於建立擁有可變更屬性的不可變更物件非常有用。

span.span: useful for creating non-changeable objects that have changeable properties.
